wrestler:HipThrow.NAME: Hip Throw
wrestler:HipThrow.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage.

wrestler:Grab.NAME: Grab
wrestler:Grab.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Grapple the enemy. NL Gain !B! Block.

wrestler:CheapShot.NAME: Cheap Shot
wrestler:CheapShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL Cheap Shot cards deal !M! less damage this combat.
wrestler:CheapShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cheap Shot deals !M! less damage this combat.

wrestler:CircleBehind.NAME: Circle Behind
wrestler:CircleBehind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, gain !B! Block again. NL wrestler:Grapple the enemy.

wrestler:ElbowCut.NAME: Elbow Cut
wrestler:ElbowCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, draw !M! cards.

wrestler:EldritchBlast.NAME: Eldritch Blast
wrestler:EldritchBlast.DESCRIPTION: Add a Void into your discard pile. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

wrestler:MountainBomb.NAME: Mountain Bomb
wrestler:MountainBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage again. NL wrestler:Grapple the enemy.

wrestler:HammerStrike.NAME: Hammer Strike
wrestler:HammerStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! card from your draw pile.
wrestler:HammerStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! cards from your draw pile.

wrestler:Jab.NAME: Jab
wrestler:Jab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage !M! more times.

wrestler:Melee.NAME: Melee
wrestler:Melee.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If there are multiple enemies, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

wrestler:MindSpike.NAME: Mind Spike
wrestler:MindSpike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !wrestler:Psychic! wrestler:Psychic damage.

wrestler:PenetratingShot.NAME: Penetrating Shot
wrestler:PenetratingShot.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Grapple the enemy. If the enemy was not wrestler:Grappled, apply !M! Vulnerable.

wrestler:Scramble.NAME: Scramble
wrestler:Scramble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard !M! card from your draw pile.
wrestler:Scramble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard !M! cards from your draw pile.

wrestler:Suplex.NAME: Suplex
wrestler:Suplex.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, gain [E].

wrestler:Enfeeble.NAME: Enfeeble
wrestler:Enfeeble.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Draw 2 cards.

wrestler:WindUp.NAME: Wind Up
wrestler:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals !M! additional damage. NL If the last card you played was an Attack, gain [E].

wrestler:AgilityTraining.NAME: Agility Training
wrestler:AgilityTraining.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL You can wrestler:Grapple multiple enemies.

wrestler:Armlock.NAME: Armlock
wrestler:Armlock.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, apply !M! wrestler:Submission and the enemy loses Strength equal to their wrestler:Submission this turn. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:BearHug.NAME: Bear Hug
wrestler:BearHug.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Grapple the enemy. NL Gain !B! Block for each wrestler:Grappled enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL wrestler:Grappled enemies.

wrestler:BodyShield.NAME: Body Shield
wrestler:BodyShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever an enemy attacks this turn, deal !M! damage to ALL wrestler:Grappled enemies.

wrestler:Brainstorm.NAME: Brainstorm
wrestler:Brainstorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 card from your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Draw 3 card.
wrestler:Brainstorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 cards from your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Draw 4 cards.

wrestler:ChillTouch.NAME: Chill Touch
wrestler:ChillTouch.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you wrestler:Grapple an enemy, deal !M! wrestler:Psychic damage.

wrestler:Chokehold.NAME: Chokehold
wrestler:Chokehold.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal damage equal to the enemy's wrestler:Submission times !M!.

wrestler:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
wrestler:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you increase your wrestler:Combo wrestler:Multiplier, draw !M! card.
wrestler:Flourish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you increase your wrestler:Combo wrestler:Multiplier, draw !M! cards.

wrestler:Hypnosis.NAME: Hypnosis
wrestler:Hypnosis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !wrestler:Psychic! wrestler:Psychic damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! wrestler:Hypnotized to ALL enemies.

wrestler:InvisibleHand.NAME: Invisible Hand
wrestler:InvisibleHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is not wrestler:Grappled, gain !B! Block.

wrestler:IronGrip.NAME: Iron Grip
wrestler:IronGrip.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Grapple the enemy. NL Apply !M! wrestler:Submission.

wrestler:Lariat.NAME: Lariat
wrestler:Lariat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

wrestler:LeapFrog.NAME: Leap Frog
wrestler:LeapFrog.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

wrestler:Malady.NAME: Malady
wrestler:Malady.DESCRIPTION: Add a Void into your discard pile. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! wrestler:Malady. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:MentalWard.NAME: Mental Ward
wrestler:MentalWard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy applies a debuff to you or creates a card, that enemy loses !M! HP.

wrestler:Migraine.NAME: Migraine
wrestler:Migraine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !wrestler:Psychic! wrestler:Psychic damage to a random enemy. NL Increase the value of this card by half ( !M! ).

wrestler:MindRead.NAME: Mind Read
wrestler:MindRead.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, gain !B! Block and draw !M! card.

wrestler:ModifyMemory.NAME: Modify Memory
wrestler:ModifyMemory.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards from your draw pile. Shuffle that many cards into your draw pile.

wrestler:Piledriver.NAME: Piledriver
wrestler:Piledriver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase your wrestler:Combo wrestler:Multiplier by !M!.

wrestler:Pounce.NAME: Pounce
wrestler:Pounce.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Grapple the enemy. NL If the enemy was not wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage.

wrestler:SelfDelusion.NAME: Self Delusion
wrestler:SelfDelusion.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand. Exhaust.
wrestler:SelfDelusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand. Exhaust.

wrestler:ShockingGrasp.NAME: Shocking Grasp
wrestler:ShockingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you are dealt unblocked damage this turn, deal !M! damage back.

wrestler:ThoughtEater.NAME: Thought Eater
wrestler:ThoughtEater.DESCRIPTION: Deal !wrestler:Psychic! wrestler:Psychic damage. NL Shuffle !M! cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.

wrestler:UncannyLaughter.NAME: Uncanny Laughter
wrestler:UncannyLaughter.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, deal !M! wrestler:Psychic damage to a random enemy.

wrestler:Untouchable.NAME: Untouchable
wrestler:Untouchable.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your wrestler:Combo wrestler:Multiplier.

wrestler:Vanish.NAME: Vanish
wrestler:Vanish.DESCRIPTION: Add a Void into your discard pile. NL Gain !B! Block.

wrestler:VoidSyphon.NAME: Void Syphon
wrestler:VoidSyphon.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Next turn, draw 1 fewer card.
wrestler:VoidSyphon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Next turn, draw 1 fewer card.

wrestler:WeightTraining.NAME: Weight Training
wrestler:WeightTraining.DESCRIPTION: Enemies escape your wrestler:Grapple in 1 extra turn.
wrestler:WeightTraining.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Enemies escape your wrestler:Grapple in 1 extra turn.

wrestler:Amnesia.NAME: Amnesia
wrestler:Amnesia.DESCRIPTION: Lose all debuffs. NL At the beginning of each turn, discard !M! cards from your draw pile.
wrestler:Amnesia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all debuffs. NL At the beginning of each turn, discard up to !M! cards from your draw pile.

wrestler:Catapult.NAME: Catapult
wrestler:Catapult.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Remove wrestler:Grapple from ALL enemies

wrestler:DominateMind.NAME: Dominate Mind
wrestler:DominateMind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !wrestler:Psychic! wrestler:Psychic damage. NL Apply !M! Weak, Vulnerable, and wrestler:Hypnotized.

wrestler:EldritchForm.NAME: Eldritch Form
wrestler:EldritchForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 5 wrestler:Hypnotized to ALL enemies and increase this value by !M!.

wrestler:EldritchInsight.NAME: Eldritch Insight
wrestler:EldritchInsight.DESCRIPTION: Add a Void into your discard pile. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
wrestler:EldritchInsight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Void into your discard pile. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:IntoNothing.NAME: Into Nothing
wrestler:IntoNothing.DESCRIPTION: Add a Void into your discard pile. NL Deal !wrestler:Psychic! wrestler:Psychic damage. NL Whenever a Void card exhausts, the enemy loses !M! HP.

wrestler:DormantMutation.NAME: Dormant Mutation
wrestler:DormantMutation.DESCRIPTION: The enemy loses !M! HP at the end of their turn and doubles this value. NL If the enemy would die from this, it is replaced with an wrestler:Aberration.

wrestler:Leverage.NAME: Leverage
wrestler:Leverage.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to your block this turn. NL Remove your block. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:MindMeld.NAME: Mind Meld
wrestler:MindMeld.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to their attack and apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:OutOfNothing.NAME: Out of Nothing
wrestler:OutOfNothing.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Shuffle X copies of NL that card into your NL draw pile. NL Exhaust.
wrestler:OutOfNothing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Shuffle X+1 copies of NL that card into your NL draw pile. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:OutOfReach.NAME: Out of Reach
wrestler:OutOfReach.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy is wrestler:Grappled, gain !B! Block. NL Remove wrestler:Grapple from ALL enemies.

wrestler:Pizzazz.NAME: Pizzazz
wrestler:Pizzazz.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your wrestler:Combo wrestler:Multiplier increases, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

wrestler:Submit.NAME: Submit
wrestler:Submit.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Grapple the enemy. NL Apply !M! wrestler:Submission. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:TagTeam.NAME: Tag Team
wrestler:TagTeam.DESCRIPTION: Double your energy. Draw a card for each card in your hand. Double your Strength and Dexterity this turn. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:Torment.NAME: Torment
wrestler:Torment.DESCRIPTION: Attack cards deal !M! additional wrestler:Psychic damage.

wrestler:VitalityDrain.NAME: Vitality Drain
wrestler:VitalityDrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !wrestler:Psychic! wrestler:Psychic damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, heal HP equal to the damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:WearDown.NAME: Wear Down
wrestler:WearDown.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, apply !M! wrestler:Submission to ALL wrestler:Grappled enemies.
wrestler:WearDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, apply !M! wrestler:Submission to ALL wrestler:Grappled enemies.

wrestler:WeirdConduit.NAME: Weird Conduit
wrestler:WeirdConduit.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle !M! card from your discard pile into your draw pile and draw !M! card.
wrestler:WeirdConduit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle !M! card from your discard pile into your draw pile and draw !M! card.
